org.fujion.highcharts

Class ChartOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.ancillary.Options
      • org.fujion.highcharts.ChartOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptionMap.IOptionMapConverter

    public class ChartOptions
extends Options
    Options regarding the chart area and plot area as well as general chart options.

    • Field Detail

      • alignTicks

        public Boolean alignTicks
        When using multiple axis, the ticks of two or more opposite axes will automatically be aligned by adding ticks to the axis or axes with the least ticks. This can be prevented by setting alignTicks to false. If the grid lines look messy, it's a good idea to hide them for the secondary axis by setting gridLineWidth to 0. Defaults to true.

      • animation

        public Object animation
        Set the overall animation for all chart updating. Animation can be disabled throughout the chart by setting it to false here. It can be overridden for each individual API method as a function parameter. The only animation not affected by this option is the initial series animation, see plotOptions.series => animation. The animation can either be set as a boolean or a configuration object. If true, it will use the 'swing' jQuery easing and a duration of 500 ms. If used as a configuration object, the following properties are supported:
        • duration - The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
        • easing - When using jQuery as the general framework, the easing can be set to linear or swing. More easing functions are available with the use of jQuery plug-ins, most notably the jQuery UI suite. See the jQuery docs. When using MooTools as the general framework, use the property name transition instead of easing.
        Defaults to true.

      • backgroundColor

        public String backgroundColor
        The background color or gradient for the outer chart area. Defaults to "#FFFFFF".

      • borderColor

        public String borderColor
        The color of the outer chart border. The border is painted using vector graphic techniques to allow rounded corners. Defaults to "#4572A7".

      • borderRadius

        public Integer borderRadius
        The corner radius of the outer chart border. Defaults to 5.

      • borderWidth

        public Integer borderWidth
        The pixel width of the outer chart border. The border is painted using vector graphic techniques to allow rounded corners. Defaults to 0.

      • className

        public String className
        A CSS class name to apply to the charts container div, allowing unique CSS styling for each chart. Defaults to "".

      • height

        public Integer height
        An explicit height for the chart. By default the height is calculated from the offset height of the containing element. Defaults to null.

      • ignoreHiddenSeries

        public Boolean ignoreHiddenSeries
        If true, the axes will scale to the remaining visible series once one series is hidden. If false, hiding and showing a series will not affect the axes or the other series. For stacks, once one series within the stack is hidden, the rest of the stack will close in around it even if the axis is not affected. Defaults to true.

      • inverted

        public Boolean inverted
        Whether to invert the axes so that the x axis is vartical and y axis is horizontal. When true, the x axis is reversed by default. If a bar series is present in the chart, it will be inverted automatically. Defaults to false.

      • marginBottom

        public Integer marginBottom
        The margin between the bottom outer edge of the chart and the plot area. Use this to set a fixed pixel value for the margin as opposed to the default dynamic margin. See also spacingBottom. Defaults to 70.

      • marginLeft

        public Integer marginLeft
        The margin between the left outer edge of the chart and the plot area. Use this to set a fixed pixel value for the margin as opposed to the default dynamic margin. See also spacingLeft. Defaults to 80.

      • marginRight

        public Integer marginRight
        The margin between the right outer edge of the chart and the plot area. Use this to set a fixed pixel value for the margin as opposed to the default dynamic margin. See also spacingRight. Defaults to 50.

      • marginTop

        public Integer marginTop
        The margin between the top outer edge of the chart and the plot area. Use this to set a fixed pixel value for the margin as opposed to the default dynamic margin. See also spacingTop. Defaults to null.

      • options3d

        public final ThreeDOptions options3d
        Options to render charts in 3 dimensions. This feature requires highcharts-3d.js.

      • plotBackgroundColor

        public String plotBackgroundColor
        The background color or gradient for the plot area. Defaults to null.

      • plotBackgroundImage

        public String plotBackgroundImage
        The URL for an image to use as the plot background. To set an image as the background for the entire chart, set a CSS background image to the container element. Defaults to null.

      • plotBorderColor

        public String plotBorderColor
        The color of the inner chart or plot area border. Defaults to "#C0C0C0".

      • plotBorderWidth

        public Integer plotBorderWidth
        The pixel width of the plot area border. Defaults to 0.

      • plotShadow

        public Object plotShadow
        Whether to apply a drop shadow to the plot area. Requires that plotBackgroundColor be set. The shadow can be a ShadowOptions object. Defaults to false.
        See Also:
        ShadowOptions

      • polar

        public Boolean polar
        When true, Cartesian charts like line, spline, area and column are transformed into the polar coordinate system.

      • reflow

        protected final Boolean reflow
        Whether to reflow the chart to fit the width of the container div on resizing the window. Under Fujion, the container handles resizing, so this option is forced to false.

      • renderTo

        protected String renderTo
        Id of the parent element that will host the chart. This will be set automatically.

      • resetZoomButton

        public Object resetZoomButton
        The button that appears after a selection zoom, allowing the user to reset zoom.

      • selectionMarkerFill

        public String selectionMarkerFill
        The background color of the marker square when selecting (zooming in on) an area of the chart. Defaults to rgba(69,114,167,0.25). Defaults to rgba(69114,167,0.25).

      • shadow

        public Boolean shadow
        Whether to apply a drop shadow to the outer chart area. Requires that backgroundColor be set. The shadow can be a ShadowOptions object. Defaults to false.
        See Also:
        ShadowOptions

      • showAxes

        public Boolean showAxes
        Whether to show the axes initially. This only applies to empty charts where series are added dynamically, as axes are automatically added to Cartesian series. Defaults to false.

      • spacingBottom

        public Integer spacingBottom
        The space between the bottom edge of the chart and the content (plot area, axis title and labels, title, subtitle or legend in top position). Defaults to 15.

      • spacingLeft

        public Integer spacingLeft
        The space between the left edge of the chart and the content (plot area, axis title and labels, title, subtitle or legend in top position). Defaults to 10.

      • spacingRight

        public Integer spacingRight
        The space between the right edge of the chart and the content (plot area, axis title and labels, title, subtitle or legend in top position). Defaults to 10.

      • spacingTop

        public Integer spacingTop
        The space between the top edge of the chart and the content (plot area, axis title and labels, title, subtitle or legend in top position). . Defaults to 10.

      • style

        public final StyleOptions style
        Additional CSS styles to apply inline to the container div. Note that since the default font styles are applied in the renderer, it is ignorant of the individual chart options and must be set globally. Defaults to: 
             fontFamily: '"Lucida Grande", "Lucida Sans Unicode", Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif'
     fontSize: '12px'

      • type

        protected String type
        The series type. Defaults to "line".

      • width

        public Integer width
        An explicit width for the chart. By default the width is calculated from the offset width of the containing element. Defaults to null.

      • zoomType

        public ZoomType zoomType
        Decides in what dimensions the user can zoom by dragging the mouse. Can be one of x, y or xy. Defaults to null.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChartOptions

        public ChartOptions()
